name: Growth Funnel: Acquisition → Activation → Retention PRD

sections.title: Overview
sections.content: Define the end-to-end growth system across acquisition, activation, retention, and referral, with an experimentation engine.

sections.title: Acquisition
sections.content: Channels, targeting, CAC constraints, attribution, landing pages; lead qualification and handoff.

sections.title: Activation
sections.content: Aha-moment definition, onboarding steps, time-to-first-value, friction removal, in-app guidance.

sections.title: Retention
sections.content: Habit loops, engagement ladders, lifecycle messaging, churn prediction/mitigation.

sections.title: Referral & Virality
sections.content: Referral loops, incentives, network effects, ambassador programs; anti-gaming policies.

sections.title: Experimentation Framework
sections.content: Hypothesis template, guardrail metrics, sample sizing, instrumentation, and learning repository.
